data.quote: I do a lot of teen shows and voice over work for animation, so when I got the part in 'The Number 23,' it was really cool because now I get to be in a movie with Jim Carrey. Acting in this movie was really a learning experience for me.

data.quote: I actually hope people don't react to 'Impossible' in a way where they think it's terribly retro. The plot needed to do what it needed to do. data.quote: 'Catcher in the Rye.' I feel like any brooding teen loves that book.

data.quote: When I got near teen age, I was so happy with my friends and the African-American culture that I couldn't imagine not being part of it.

data.quote: I progressed through so many different styles of music through my teen years, both as a player and a vocalist, particularly the jazz and pop of the early 20th Century.

data.quote: Maturity is only a short break in adolescence.
data.author: Jules Feiffer

data.quote: My own experience being bullied - it made me a more compassionate person. It made me more sympathetic to the adolescent experience.
data.author: Carolyn Mackler

data.quote: Teenage girls read in packs. It's true today, and it was true when I was a teen growing up in a small town in northeast Oklahoma.
data.author: Ally Carter

data.quote: A departure from the movie with Michael J. Fox, 'Teen Wolf' tells the story of how a group of angsty teens deal with werewolves, their supernatural kin and the world of trouble that comes with it, all while trying to still live their lives.
data.author: Keahu Kahuanui

data.quote: It hasn't been until the last couple years that I've started playing close to my age. But it's fun playing the younger roles because it takes you back to the teen years.
data.author: Kerr Smith

data.quote: This is actually something no one knows, but my mom was really the one who created the entire style for 'Teen Witch.' I'm dead serious. She was super involved, and is super creative, so I wore a lot of my actual clothes in the movie. Truly, Louise was my mom's vision. She really created an iconic character.
data.author: Robyn Lively

data.quote: Because of people like that guy in San Francisco who told me it changed his life, 'Teen Witch' is my most favorite thing I've ever done. I see how happy it makes people, and that makes me happy. The great thing is that no one realized it was going to become all these things when we were making it. We thought we were making a very serious movie.
data.author: Robyn Lively

data.quote: My younger sister and younger brother are huge 'Teen Witch' fans.
data.author: Robyn Lively

data.quote: This is actually something no one knows, but my mom was really the one who created the entire style for 'Teen Witch.' I'm dead serious.
data.author: Robyn Lively

data.quote: I think teen girls will like 'Geek Charming' because they really focus on the 'populars' and nerdy people and people who are in between the nerds and between the populars. So it really hits every category of what girls are going through in high school.

data.quote: There's an indie movie I did called 'Fat Kid Rules the World,' which was based on a teen book, and it's a fabulous story, and hopefully it'll go to theaters because it is an amazing story.
data.author: Lili Simmons

data.quote: 'Pretty Little Liars,' you know, it's a teen show that grew to be something bigger. I think you had girls from ages 7 to, like, 20 watching the show, and that was the predominant audience. Then it grew to be for girls, boys, men, women, people who are 7 to 35. I think that's crazy.

data.quote: The 'Teen Wolf' fans are so great.

data.quote: I was a big fan of black gospel. As a kid, there were black groups I sang with from my teen years to my early 20s.

data.quote: Music is probably the only real magic I have encountered in my life. There's not some trick involved with it. It's pure and it's real. It moves, it heals, it communicates and does all these incredible things.

data.quote: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: To me there is no picture so beautiful as smiling, bright-eyed, happy children; no music so sweet as their clear and ringing laughter.

data.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.

data.quote: I think music in itself is healing. It's an explosive expression of humanity. It's something we are all touched by. No matter what culture we're from, everyone loves music.

data.author: Dimebag Darrell

data.author: Louis Armstrong

data.quote: I was raised in a very humble environment, and I was always taught to be humble to the things that are happening in my life because they're blessings. They're blessings in every way. data.quote: Tones sound, and roar and storm about me until I have set them down in notes.

data.quote: Like sunshine, music is a powerful force that can instantly and almost chemically change your entire mood.

data.quote: I don't come from a film background. I haven't learned anything about films or film-making. But I have a thirst to know everything about my profession. data.quote: Music is the voice that tells us that the human race is greater than it knows.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: Michael Jordan changed so much in basketball, he took his power to make a difference. It's so much going on in music right now and somebody has to make a difference.

data.quote: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music.

data.quote: The man that hath no music in himself, Nor is not moved with concord of sweet sounds, is fit for treasons, stratagems and spoils.

data.quote: Soul music is true to its name. It's music that connects to your soul, your spirit. data.quote: For my birthday this year, my girlfriends - who knew I'd just inherited my dad's turntable - gave me a carton of albums like 'Blue Kentucky Girl,' by Emmylou Harris, and 'Off the Wall,' by Michael Jackson. It's all stuff we grew up with. I mean, you can't have a music collection without Prince's 'Purple Rain' - it just can't be done!
data.author: Connie Britton

data.quote: Opera is the ultimate art form. It has singing and music and drama and dance and emotion and story.
data.author: Diane Paulus

data.quote: I would go to sleep with headphones on. My mom and pop - they would have music loud enough to shake the walls.
data.author: Dr. Dre

data.quote: Disco is music for dancing, and people will always want to dance.
data.author: Giorgio Moroder

data.quote: I would love to continue in music, with writing... but I am not the kind of person who will hang around if I start to become irrelevant. data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: I think I first realized I wanted to be in country music and be an artist when I was 10. And I started dragging my parents to festivals, and fairs, and karaoke contests, and I did that for about a year before I came to Nashville for the first time. I was 11 and I had this demo CD of me singing Dixie Chicks and Leanne Rimes songs.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: I definitely try to be myself and not try to imitate other performers. That's why I got my music degree. I wanted to be prepared and not be a 'product.' data.quote: The standardization of world culture, with local popular or traditional forms driven out or dumbed down to make way for American television, American music, food, clothes and films, has been seen by many as the very heart of globalization.
data.author: Fredric Jameson

data.quote: Of all noises, I think music is the least disagreeable.
data.author: Samuel Johnson

data.quote: A big part of making music is the discovery aspect, is the surprise aspect. That's why I think I'll always love sampling. data.quote: The idea of music is to liberate the listener and lead him to a frame where he feels he is elevated.
data.author: A. R. Rahman

data.quote: Filmmaking is a very complex form - ya know, acting, lighting, screenwriting, storytelling, music, editing - all these things have to come together.
data.author: Jay Duplass

data.quote: Music is the medicine of the mind.
data.author: John A. Logan

data.quote: There are more love songs than anything else. If songs could make you do something we'd all love one another.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: My music had roots which I'd dug up from my own childhood, musical roots buried in the darkest soil.
data.author: Ray Charles

data.quote: What is a poet? An unhappy person who conceals profound anguish in his heart but whose lips are so formed that as sighs and cries pass over them they sound like beautiful music.
data.author: Soren Kierkegaard

data.quote: Rock music is not meant to be perfect.
data.author: Ozzy Osbourne

data.quote: Music is my life, it is a reflection of what I go through.

data.quote: I'm very easily distracted unless I have music on. Listening to music while I brainstorm makes me think of scenes that would fit the mood of the music I'm playing.

data.quote: When wheat is ripening properly, when the wind is blowing across the field, you can hear the beards of the wheat rubbing together. They sound like the pine needles in a forest. It is a sweet, whispering music that once you hear, you never forget.

data.quote: Film music should have the same relationship to the film drama that somebody's piano playing in my living room has on the book I am reading.
data.author: Igor Stravinsky

data.quote: Music is a language, you see, a universal language.

data.quote: I definitely shut down sometimes. I always just go into my own little cocoon and write, and I surround myself with as much music as possible. That playlist just was long!
data.author: Tristan Wilds

data.quote: Music does a lot of things for a lot of people. It's transporting, for sure. It can take you right back, years back, to the very moment certain things happened in your life. It's uplifting, it's encouraging, it's strengthening.

data.quote: I've been designing since I was 8. I started sketching dresses I could wear when skating. I was always involved in all aspects of skating, not just the technique, the choreography, the music, but the visual aspects, too - what I should wear.

data.quote: Tintinnabulation is an area I sometimes wander into when I am searching for answers - in my life, my music, my work. In my dark hours, I have the certain feeling that everything outside this one thing has no meaning.

data.quote: He who joyfully marches to music in rank and file has already earned my contempt. He has been given a large brain by mistake, since for him the spinal cord would suffice.

data.quote: I don't care much about music. What I like is sounds.

data.author: E. W. Howe

data.quote: As long as my music is real, it's no limit to how many ears I can grab.
data.author: Kendrick Lamar

data.quote: When you go to a great concert, you feel this arc, almost like the music of a well-chosen set takes you on this trip through emotions and through various forms of intellectual engagement.

data.author: Sylvia Earle

data.quote: All that stuff about heavy metal and hard rock, I don't subscribe to any of that. It's all just music. Who's to say what is and isn't a certain type of music?

data.quote: I listen to all types of different music. I go to different festivals. I'm around music.

data.quote: Classical music requires an immense amount of concentration, and I don't know if I would've been that committed to that particular life.

data.quote: I think country music is popular - has been popular and will always be popular because I think a lot of real people singing about a lot of real stuff about real people. And it's simple enough for people to understand it. And we kind of roll with the punches.

data.quote: I'm happy to be on a winning team. My individual success, that lasts for a short period of time. The success of being a part of the South, of Atlanta, which is now the hot bed of music, that's what's gonna last the longest. The fact that I contributed to planting our flag and moving music to my city, that's what I'm most proud of.

data.quote: Stockholm is unique in that it's built on islands and surrounded by water, so you get this enormous sense of freedom. It's got everything you could possibly need - everything New York or London has but without all the people and traffic. It's also become a very creative city, not only for music but also for fashion and computer games.
data.author: Bjorn Ulvaeus

data.quote: Making words rhyme for a living is one of the great joys of my life... That's a superpower I've been very conscious of developing. data.quote: We need to take music out of the ivory tower - both for musicians and for the public. Otherwise, classical music will not survive the 21st century.

data.quote: I am a person who thinks about the music first in trying to achieve something musically valid.
data.author: Sonny Rollins

data.quote: Soul music is timeless.
data.author: Alicia Keys

data.quote: You can't fake this music. You might be a great singer or a great musician but, in the need, that's got nothing to do with it. It's how you connect to the songs and to the history behind them.

data.quote: Music is really driving my whole life.
data.author: Ariana Grande

data.quote: The paradox is that I have no love for myself as a human being, but I have immense pride in the music I make, and I believe it has an important place. Others do, too, and the thousands of people with Morrissey tattoos certainly proves something.

data.quote: Soul music is about longevity and reaching and touching people on a human level - and that's never going to get lost.
data.author: Jill Scott

data.quote: My best hostess tip is to have good food and really good music!
data.author: Jennifer Aniston

data.quote: Food is one part of the experience. And it has to be somewhere between 50 to 60 percent of the dining experience. But the rest counts as well: The mood, the atmosphere, the music, the feeling, the design, the harmony between what you have on the plate and what surrounds the plate.
data.author: Alain Ducasse

data.quote: It's very easy for people to put out music.
data.author: Charlie Puth

data.quote: I have a sweet tooth for song and music. This is my Polish sin.
data.author: Pope John Paul II

data.quote: It's always been a gift with me, hearing music the way I do. I don't know where it comes from, it's just there and I don't question it.

data.quote: It is not the money but the self-respect and wanting to create good music.
data.author: Barry Gibb

data.quote: The century of airplanes has a right to its own music.
data.author: Claude Debussy

data.quote: That's my fun time so, to me, doing my homework, studying on what I do, watching the movies, listening to music, all that inspires me so I focus a lot on that and practice.

data.author: Dave Van Ronk

data.quote: A good compromise, a good piece of legislation, is like a good sentence; or a good piece of music. Everybody can recognize it. They say, 'Huh. It works. It makes sense.'

data.quote: This land is your land and this land is my land, sure, but the world is run by those that never listen to music anyway.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: I think older people can appreciate my music because I really show my heart when I sing, and it's not corny. I think I can grow as an artist, and my fans will grow with me.
data.author: Justin Bieber

data.quote: The basis of our partnership strategy and our partnership approach: We build the social technology. They provide the music.
data.author: Mark Zuckerberg

data.quote: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
data.author: Trey Anastasio

data.author: Chris Cornell

data.quote: I try to greet my friends with a drink in my hand, a warm smile on my face, and great music in the background, because that's what gets a dinner party off to a fun start.

data.quote: A nation that has no music and no fairytales is a tragedy.
data.author: Ai Weiwei

data.quote: When you write a play, you work out like a musician on a piece of music. You find all the rhythms and the melody and the harmonies and take them as they come.

data.author: Jimmy Buffett

data.quote: I have absorbed my life now. I am ready for my music to unfold. I know time flies, but before the end of this year, the album will be out. Even if it kills me.
data.author: Neneh Cherry

data.quote: Musicians should not play music. Music should play musicians.
data.author: Henry Rollins

data.quote: People don't appreciate music any more. They don't adore it. They don't buy vinyl and just love it. They love their laptops like their best friend, but they don't love a record for its sound quality and its artwork.

data.quote: Nevertheless the passions, whether violent or not, should never be so expressed as to reach the point of causing disgust; and music, even in situations of the greatest horror, should never be painful to the ear but should flatter and charm it, and thereby always remain music.

data.quote: We'd like to think that our music will always be bigger than any one of our individual personalities.
data.author: Chester Bennington

data.quote: Rock music should be gross: that's the fun of it. It gets up and drops its trousers.

data.quote: I don't know, my music has always just come from where the wind blew me. Like where I'm at during a particular moment in time.

data.quote: Lean your body forward slightly to support the guitar against your chest, for the poetry of the music should resound in your heart.
data.author: Andres Segovia

data.quote: It's very easy to be cynical about the hall of fame. But on the other hand, it's really a beautiful thing for someone like me. I dedicated my entire life to this music.
data.author: Tom Petty

data.quote: With so many ways to communicate at our disposal, we must not forget the transformative power of a live music experience and genuine human exchange.

data.quote: Personally, I just think rap music is the best thing out there, period. If you look at my deck in my car radio, you're always going to find a hip-hop tape; that's all I buy, that's all I live, that's all I listen to, that's all I love.

data.quote: How to play music may be known. At the commencement of the piece, all the parts should sound together. As it proceeds, they should be in harmony while severally distinct and flowing without break, and thus on to the conclusion.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: We should make decisions in life with our hearts, not our brains, not only in music but in daily life.
data.author: Andre Rieu

data.quote: There is a sound that comes from gospel music that doesn't come from anything else. It is a sound of peace. It is a sound of, 'I'm going to make it through all of this.'

data.quote: I think in London - and I don't wanna offend anybody in America, but this is a real statement - they still have the right approach to making music. data.author: Jay-Z

data.quote: My liberty is about living. It's about spreading more love. Even though I was always a peaceful, loving individual, my music sometimes didn't reflect that. But now it's different. My music is reflecting the way I feel.

data.quote: Music is essentially an emotional language, so you want to feel something from the relationships and build music based on those feelings.

data.quote: I try to make music with emotion and integrity. And authenticity. You can feel when something's authentic, and you can feel when it's not: you know when someone's trying to make the club record, or trying to make the girl record, or trying to make the thug record. It's none of that. It's just my emotions.
data.author: Jay-Z

data.quote: I suffer from deep depression, so my only release is music.
data.author: Kevin Gates

data.quote: For me, music and life are all about style.
data.author: Miles Davis

data.quote: You walk off the plane in Rio, and your blood temperature goes up. The feel of the wind on your face, the water on your skin, the taste of the food, the music, the sexuality; Brazilians are very comfortable in their sexuality.

data.quote: For me, music making is the most joyful activity possible, the most perfect expression of any emotion.
data.author: Luciano Pavarotti

data.quote: The Internet is both great and terrible. As a source of information, a tool for delivering music and art, it's great. But spamming ads and piracy of music is terrible. It's stealing.

data.quote: I grew up around salsa, merengue, bachata, bass music, freestyle, hip-hop, techno, house, rave.

data.quote: I've said that playing the blues is like having to be black twice. Stevie Ray Vaughan missed on both counts, but I never noticed.

data.quote: Music, in performance, is a type of sculpture. The air in the performance is sculpted into something.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: When words leave off, music begins.
data.author: Heinrich Heine

data.quote: All good music resembles something. Good music stirs by its mysterious resemblance to the objects and feelings which motivated it.
data.author: Jean Cocteau

data.quote: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
data.author: Pablo Casals

data.quote: Music is forever; music should grow and mature with you, following you right on up until you die.
data.author: Paul Simon

data.quote: Music is well said to be the speech of angels.
data.author: Thomas Carlyle

data.quote: Music has charms to sooth a savage breast, to soften rocks, or bend a knotted oak.
data.author: William Congreve

data.quote: I see music as fluid architecture.
data.author: Joni Mitchell

data.quote: The only love affair I have ever had was with music.
data.author: Maurice Ravel

data.quote: I've never missed a gig yet. Music makes people happy, and that's why I go on doing it - I like to see everybody smile.
data.author: Buddy Guy

data.quote: Music is a performance and needs the audience.
data.author: Michael Tippett

data.quote: My music, my songs are 100 percent inspired by girl power.
data.author: Paulina Rubio

data.quote: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears.
data.author: Adele

data.quote: Blues is my life. It's a true feeling that comes from the heart, not something that just comes out of my mouth. Blues is what I love, and blues is what I always do.
data.author: Koko Taylor

data.quote: This will be our reply to violence: to make music more intensely, more beautifully, more devotedly than ever before.
data.author: Leonard Bernstein

data.quote: A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write, if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself.
data.author: Abraham Maslow

data.quote: The type of music I make, it's not just straight-up rapping. There's emotion in it. That's why people feel each song differently. I get all my vibes from rock music, you know? All my melodies and all that.

data.quote: The blues. It runs through all American music. Somebody bending the note. The other is the two-beat groove. It's in New Orleans music, it's in jazz, it's in country music, it's in gospel.

data.quote: Good fashion is like rock music: all anarchy and revolt.
data.author: Ann Demeulemeester

data.quote: The ecstatic insanity of romantic pursuit can be so enhanced by music that entire romantic conquests, victories and ruinous, crushing defeats can be tied to songs to such a degree that it's almost unbearable to listen to them again, as they bring back the memories so vividly.

data.quote: Feelings such as loneliness, longing or love are sometimes hard to put into words; maybe that's why we all love music, because it resonates with something we can't share.
data.author: Agnes Obel

data.quote: People speculate on your personal life all the time anyway. So I just think it's important to keep my private life private and my public persona more into music, you know?
data.author: Prince

data.quote: Through literacy you can begin to see the universe. Through music you can reach anybody. Between the two there is you, unstoppable.
data.author: Grace Slick

data.quote: Hip-Hop isn't just music, it is also a spiritual movement of the blacks! You can't just call Hip-Hop a trend!
data.author: Lauryn Hill

data.quote: I know what I've done for music, but don't call me a legend. Just call me Miles Davis.
data.author: Miles Davis

data.quote: Motown was about music for all people - white and black, blue and green, cops and the robbers. I was reluctant to have our music alienate anyone.
data.author: Berry Gordy

data.quote: When I think of music, I think of music in its totality, complete. From the lowest blues to the highest symphony, you know, so what I'd like to do is exemplify each style of as many periods as I can possibly do.
data.author: Donny Hathaway

data.quote: I'm inspired by artists and musicians. There are so many wonderful and talented people in the world. I love discovering new music, new writers, or new art.
data.author: Alicia Keys

data.quote: Our world is enriched when coders and marketers dazzle us with smartphones and tablets, but, by themselves, they are just slabs. It is the music, essays, entertainment and provocations that they access, spawned by the humanities, that animate them - and us.
data.author: Nicholas Kristof

data.quote: Beethoven can write music, thank God, but he can do nothing else on earth.
data.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

data.quote: May not music be described as the mathematics of the sense, mathematics as music of the reason? The musician feels mathematics, the mathematician thinks music: music the dream, mathematics the working life.
data.author: James Joseph Sylvester

data.quote: The end of all good music is to affect the soul.
data.author: Claudio Monteverdi

data.quote: Dre was one of my heros in the music industry. If he's not down for his homeboys, I don't wanna be a part of him or around him.
data.author: Tupac Shakur

data.quote: All art constantly aspires towards the condition of music.
data.author: Walter Pater

data.quote: Some people create with words or with music or with a brush and paints. I like to make something beautiful when I run. I like to make people stop and say, 'I've never seen anyone run like that before.' It's more than just a race, it's a style. It's doing something better than anyone else. It's being creative.
data.author: Steve Prefontaine

data.quote: Music is gathering. Taking our scattered thoughts and senses and coalescing us back into our core. Music is powerful. The first few chords can change us where no self-help books can.
data.author: Jane Siberry

data.quote: New Orleans is unlike any city in America. Its cultural diversity is woven into the food, the music, the architecture - even the local superstitions. It's a sensory experience on all levels and there's a story lurking around every corner.
data.author: Ruta Sepetys

data.quote: The flame that is naturally clear always gives the most light and heat. If I could blend my talent for poetry and music into one, the light would burn still clearer, and I might go far.
data.author: Robert Schumann

data.quote: If something happened where I couldn't write music anymore, it would kill me. It's not just a job. It's not just a hobby. It's why I get up in the morning.
data.author: Hans Zimmer

data.quote: Heartbreak was the impetus to me writing poems and music in the first place. Over the years, I had my heart broken so badly that if I didn't find a way to get all the pain out, I was going to lose my mind. I was crazy! Like, wanting to slash tires and smash car windows. Crazy! I was so hurt that I had to write.
data.author: Jill Scott

data.quote: If you ever go to a music session, you'll notice that the musicians can sit down and start playing right away, and everyone knows what to do. Of course they're reading it, but the conductor can tweak little things, and you can take that back to directing motion pictures.
data.author: Clint Eastwood

data.quote: In Jamaica, them always have throwback riddims, recycled old beats, and the hardcore reggae scene is always present. You have faster stuff like the more commercialized stuff, but you always have that segment of music that is always from the core, from the original root of it.
data.author: Damian Marley

data.quote: One of my favorite places I've visited is Havana, Cuba. On my way home from Costa Rica, I did a week in Havana. The colors, the music, the beautiful men and the cars! I love vintage and antique cars and own a couple myself.
data.author: Megalyn Echikunwoke

data.quote: I'm a DJ who makes dance music who got to play with Sting.
data.author: Afrojack

data.quote: Oratory is the masterful art. Poetry, painting, music, sculpture, architecture please, thrill, inspire - but oratory rules. The orator dominates those who hear him, convinces their reason, controls their judgment, compels their action. For the time being, he is master.
data.author: David Josiah Brewer

data.quote: For me, I actually come from an electronic dance music background: house music, electro house, trance music, even. When I was coming out of school, basically, I discovered Brain Fever, Flying Lotus, J Dilla and all that. That was when I got excited about hip-hop and when the Flume project started.
data.author: Flume

data.quote: I completely love playing and designing games and always will. I am so into games that I listen to game music all day. That may sound strange, but you can guarantee I'm a hardcore gamer and would never let you down by designing a crappy title.
data.author: John Romero

data.quote: It takes a real soldier to stay in the music industry and live off the things that have been put before me and be able to survive all this time because it has not been easy.
data.author: Chubby Checker

data.quote: Disco music in the '70s was just a call to go wild and party and dance with no thought or conscience or regard for tomorrow.
data.author: Martha Reeves

data.quote: Nothing pleases me more than to go into a room and come out with a piece of music.
data.author: Paul McCartney

data.quote: I wonder if anyone else has an ear so tuned and sharpened as I have, to detect the music, not of the spheres, but of earth, subtleties of major and minor chord that the wind strikes upon the tree branches. Have you ever heard the earth breathe?
data.author: Kate Chopin

data.quote: Rock and Roll: Music for the neck downwards.
data.author: Keith Richards

data.quote: The power of music in Spanish is so strong, that I couldn't stay away from it any longer.
data.author: Enrique Iglesias

data.quote: I think of a piece of music as something that comes alive when it is being performed, and I feel that my role in the transmission of music is to be its best advocate at that moment.
data.author: Yo-Yo Ma

data.quote: Jazz isn't dead yet. It's the underpinning of everything in this country. Whether it's a Broadway show, or fusion, or right on through classical music, if it's coming out of the U.S., it's not going to survive unless it's got some jazz influence.
data.author: Dave Brubeck

data.quote: There was nothing more I wanted to do than to see my dad react well to my music. I still do. I send him my demos all the time.
data.author: Dan Reynolds

data.quote: I'm not a fan of anybody music who I feel like a sucka. I don't listen to you. They play you in the club, you can have the #1 jam, but if I know your character, how can I listen to your music?
data.author: Gucci Mane

data.quote: The best music happens when you have a personal connection to it. That same philosophy can extend to the instrument you hold in your hands: if a guitar means something special, you're bound to do great things with it.
data.author: Frank Iero

data.quote: I love all kinds of art. I mean, I love sketching and acting and music.
data.author: Amandla Stenberg

data.quote: I used to do crazy things that people would bail me out of, and I'm just grateful that I survived. But the music got very lost; I didn't know where I was going, and I didn't really care. I was more into just having a good time, and I think it showed.
data.author: Eric Clapton

data.quote: A lot of people ask me, 'How did you have the courage to walk up to record labels when you were 12 or 13 and jump right into the music industry?' It's because I knew I could never feel the kind of rejection that I felt in middle school. Because in the music industry, if they're gonna say no to you, at least they're gonna be polite about it.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: The star thing I can live with. The music I can't live without. And that's how it lays out for me, you know. I got as big an ego and enjoy the attention.
data.author: Bruce Springsteen

data.quote: I think people are tired of fake music, man. And there's a lot of it. Technology has reached the point where any boob can walk into a studio and with a little AutoTuning you can have a hit song. I think it's pathetic.
data.author: Corey Taylor

data.quote: Country music has to evolve in order to survive.
data.author: Blake Shelton

data.quote: Too many pieces of music finish too long after the end.

data.quote: The martial music of every sideburned delinquent on the face of the earth.

data.quote: The opera is to music what a bawdy house is to a cathedral.

data.quote: I dare suggest that the composer would do himself and his music an immediate and eventual service by total, resolute and voluntary withdrawal from this public world to one of private performance and electronic media.

data.quote: It's so wonderful... if your whole day is rotten, once they start the music, it seems to melt away.

data.quote: The ideal situation would be to bypass all of the drama and mayhem and just get the music right to the people. I'm confident that we'll eventually figure it out.

data.quote: There's so much beautiful music in the world, and the kids are getting robbed.

data.quote: All old music was modern once, and much more of the music of yesterday already sounds more old-fashioned than works which were written three centuries ago.

data.quote: There's nothing to compare to live music, there just isn't anything.

data.quote: There are only two things worth aiming for, good music and a clean conscience.

data.quote: I mean, if you turn on the radio, love is 90 percent of the music.

data.quote: Coldplay are just four friends trying to make great music.

data.quote: The saxophone is a very interesting machine, but I'm more interested in music.

data.quote: I've never believed that pop music is escapist trash. There's always a darkness in it, even amidst great pop music.

data.quote: The character of instrumental music... lets the emotions radiate and shine in their own character without presuming to display them as real or imaginary representations.

data.quote: What's really good is African drum music.

data.quote: I write the vocals last, because I wanted to invent the music first and push the music to the level that I had to compete against it.

data.quote: The Bee Gees who are brilliant, I just love great music.

data.quote: I think you have to keep a childlike quality to play music or make a record.

data.quote: Punk is not just the sound, the music. Punk is a lifestyle.

data.quote: It is piracy, not overt online music stores, which is our main competitor.

data.quote: Music is my life, professionally, for nearly 60 years. To be recognized by the academy is still the highest honor.

data.quote: I want my music to do the explaining.

data.quote: There is hardly any money interest in art, and music will be there when money is gone.

data.quote: There is two kinds of music, the good, and the bad. I play the good kind.

data.quote: I was a very interested arts student, I was always into that part of school and when I got into high school I went into architectural drafting. data.quote: Music is what I love to do it's in my veins.

data.author: Quincy Jones

data.quote: I do know the effect that music still has on me - I'm completely vulnerable to it. I'm seduced by it.

data.quote: I found that it wasn't so oddball to like music and poetry and visual arts, they're kindred spirits.

data.quote: Music is love in search of a word.

data.quote: I've always felt music is the only way to give an instantaneous moment the feel of slow motion. To romanticise it and glorify it and give it a soundtrack and a rhythm.

data.quote: The best music is essentially there to provide you something to face the world with.

data.quote: I know that I'm here because of the grace of God. I'm so blessed that God has chosen me to do that.

data.quote: You have to be careful not to make music something you don't want to do. Which happens. I've gotten off the road and been like, 'I hate it. I hate singing, I hate playing guitar.' Six days later, I'm in my bedroom singing at the top of my lungs because I love it so much.

data.quote: There are many singers who have got an exceptional talent, but spend their lives singing in local trains or hotels. Does the country even know who they are? data.quote: I have three siblings. My sister makes music. My older brother is a classical conductor, and my younger brother is a mixing engineer.

data.quote: Music is a thing that changes people's lives. It has the capacity to make young people's lives better.
data.author: Noel Gallagher

data.quote: I'm free from holding personal anger because I can express what I want through my music.
data.author: Yoko Ono

data.author: Blake Shelton

data.author: Jessye Norman

data.quote: I could compare my music to white light which contains all colours. Only a prism can divide the colours and make them appear this prism could be the spirit of the listener.
data.author: Arvo Part

data.quote: Music is what I breathe, what I love to do. It keeps me alive.
data.author: Miley Cyrus

data.quote: It's all about music, because music is basically what's... been my avenue out of maybe being involved in things I shouldn't be.

data.quote: I became inspired while I was listening to music on the radio. I felt the music in my head sounded better, so I turned off the radio and scribbled it down on a piece of paper. I remember that it was in May. People liked that song. They said it was beautiful. I felt overjoyed.

data.quote: The truest expression of a people is in its dances and its music. Bodies never lie.
data.author: Agnes de Mille

data.quote: Music, Rock and Roll music especially, is such a generational thing. Each generation must have their own music, I had my own in my generation, you have yours, everyone I know has their own generation.

data.quote: Music at times is more like perfume than mathematics.
data.author: Gabriel Marcel

data.quote: He has Van Gogh's ear for music.
data.author: Billy Wilder

data.quote: Everywhere in the world, music enhances a hall, with one exception: Carnegie Hall enhances the music.
data.author: Isaac Stern

data.quote: I love being in public places, but I can't stand long, drawn-out music festivals.
data.author: Lamorne Morris

data.quote: I don't feel guilty about the music I love. If you feel guilty about something you dig, then you should stop feeling guilty about it. One of my favorite albums to this day is the 10th anniversary ensemble cast of 'Les Miserables,' the ultimate cast recording, and it is still something I love listening to top to bottom.
data.author: Corey Taylor

data.quote: I like music that's more offensive. I like it to sound like nails on a blackboard, get me wild.
data.author: Iggy Pop

data.quote: The music industry can make you feel like a prostitute.
data.author: Jonathan Davis

data.quote: Well, we like to let down our hair and pep it up at the dances, but we keep it slower when we broadcast. We have to please everybody, and that softer music appeals to the larger amount of people. It's like eating too much cake. You have to have your steak too.

data.quote: My music, I feel, has always been experimental, but it had got to a point where I felt disconnected from it completely. I didn't want to be a Clark Kent/Superman: I couldn't really say, 'Well, B.o.B's the old me, and Bobby Ray's the new me.' I had to just make a point.

data.quote: You know, I do music. If you look under the hood of the industry I'm in, it's all based on technology. From radio to phonographs to CDs, it's all technology. Microphones, reel-to-reels, cameras, editing, chips, it's all technology.
data.author: will.i.am

data.quote: When I hear music that parents hate, or older musicians hate, I know that's the new music. When I hear older people saying, 'I hate Rap or Techno' I rush to it.
data.author: George Clinton

data.quote: I want to be ripped apart by music. I want it to be something that feeds and replenishes, or that totally sucks the life out of you. I want to be dashed against the rocks.
data.author: Jeff Buckley

data.quote: I do so much music that it's like a fog, and I can't even remember all of it.
data.author: Yelawolf

data.quote: I began observing, making paintings of my surroundings, taking a vow of silence, listening, composing music, writing, and making time for formal education. Then I started telling stories.
data.author: John Francis

data.quote: Sonnymoon and Quadrants are a couple of bands that really inspire me in terms of the melodics of things and certain tones and just what feels good. It takes me back to the type of music that I grew up on in my household. We played a lot of gangsta rap, but we also played a lot of oldies, and I think that mix is part of what inspires my sound.
data.author: Kendrick Lamar

data.quote: I made numerous attempts to find a way to do it all, to be a creative singer, songwriter, producer, and to be the mother, daughter, sister, lover, wife. And the thing about music is, with me, that she's a harsh mistress. She does not come to me in the midst of stress.
data.author: Anita Baker

data.quote: I find that music makes people just sit and listen, firstly. Then, they seem to interpret their own emotions with the music and it makes them ponder their own life a lot. And then they start to question: Am I happy in my work? Am I happy in my relationships? What am I striving for?
data.author: Enya

data.quote: The 'Carousel' overture has always been one of my all-time favorite pieces of music.
data.author: Kelli O'Hara

data.quote: I would like to see more African-American singers as part of our opera companies. If you take music and the arts out of the public schools, then you're going to lose a lot of people that you might have discovered were talented, very early.
data.author: Jessye Norman

data.quote: I love to act and put on a show, but you're playing a character all the time. For music, it's really just me being myself.
data.author: Tinashe

data.quote: The language of film is further and further away from the language of theater and is closer to music. It's abstract but still narrative.
data.author: Emmanuel Lubezki

data.quote: The world of classical music is so fascinating. It's a world that encompasses people from everywhere and erases the basic restraints of nationality everyone is united by this common language of music.
data.author: Gael Garcia Bernal

data.quote: I didn't know that there were many rules in music when I first started writing.
data.author: Tyler Joseph

data.quote: If you took away all pain, if everyone lived forever, everything would be bland, flat and boring; there would be no reason for art, music, newspapers, love because we would all be in a mono state of happiness.
data.author: Matt Haig

data.quote: The way you pronounce words the Puerto Rico way, it's not really global for music. Colombians speak some of the best Spanish in the world. So having a Colombian next to me every time I write makes my music more international.
data.author: Nicky Jam

data.quote: Getting to make the music, and having a good time doing it, is the most important thing to us.
data.author: Isaac Hanson

data.quote: It is so characteristic, that just when the mechanics of reproduction are so vastly improved, there are fewer and fewer people who know how the music should be played.
data.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

data.quote: The principle of the endless melody is the perpetual becoming of a music that never had any reason for starting, any more than it has any reason for ending.
data.author: Igor Stravinsky

data.quote: I'm not trying to overcome my father or fill his shoes or reach any kind of level that he did. We're talking about a Mozart of rock music.
data.author: Sean Lennon

data.quote: But however measurable, there is much more life in music than mathematics or logic ever dreamed of.
data.author: Gabriel Marcel

data.quote: No one had ever told me that whites were supposed to sing one kind of music and blacks another - I sang what I liked in the only voice I had.
data.author: Charley Pride

data.quote: The reflection of the world is blues, that's where that part of the music is at. Then you got this other kind of music that's tryin' to come around.
data.author: Jimi Hendrix

data.quote: The movie that's had the most effect on me is Jaws. To this day when I'm in the ocean, I'm hearing that music.
data.author: Judd Nelson

data.quote: The only thing that I miss lately in all music is somebody that will put out a melody that you can whistle. It doesn't seem like there's anything happening like that.
data.author: Merle Haggard

data.quote: I painted the picture, and in the colors the rhythm of the music quivers. I painted the colors I saw.
data.author: Edvard Munch

data.quote: Jazz is the only music in which the same note can be played night after night but differently each time.
data.author: Ornette Coleman

data.quote: I want to make music that will make the blood surge in your veins, music that will get people up and dance.
data.author: Alex Kapranos

data.quote: I was influenced when I was younger by the cartoon movies that Disney put out, like Cinderella and what not. I watched those movies over and over when I was younger and the music is ingrained into my head. Nowadays, I'm still humming the tunes. It taught me the fundamentals.
data.author: Zac Efron

data.quote: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.
data.author: Lenny Kravitz

data.quote: I'm really an inner spirit that only makes itself known through the music. A lot of people think I'm an introvert, or quiet and moody. I've even heard some people say that there's a certain mystery or darkness about me. I'm not that way. I'm just really into what I do.
data.author: Faith Evans

data.quote: Trance is a very emotional and uplifting form of dance music. It appeals to many people in this way having such a strong connection with emotions. It makes people happy and ready to party.
data.author: Tiesto

data.quote: A name doesn't make the music. It's just called that to differentiate it from other types of music.
data.author: Art Blakey

data.quote: Until I realized that rock music was my connection to the rest of the human race, I felt like I was dying, for some reason, and I didn't know why.
data.author: Bruce Springsteen

data.quote: DJs are in incredible competition, musically. And they are the most musically creative and sensitive people in all the music charts. I am amazed how they are.
data.author: Yoko Ono

data.quote: Music is a whole oasis in my head. The creation process is so personal and fulfilling.
data.author: River Phoenix

data.quote: Music is the tool to express life - and all that makes a difference.
data.author: Herbie Hancock

data.quote: I do listen to other music though, and try to pick up what is good.
data.author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan

data.quote: But in the next world I shan't be doing music, with all the striving and disappointments. I shall be being it.
data.author: Ralph Vaughan Williams

data.quote: No good opera plot can be sensible, for people do not sing when they are feeling sensible.
data.author: W. H. Auden

data.quote: You know, all my songs are relatives, brothers, sisters, cousins.
data.author: David Coverdale

data.quote: R&B is the one thing that has influenced every kind of music. Every artist that there is, from those that are sung the most to Adele - you know, she was so influenced by so many R&B artists and soul music - it's clear in her writing that that's where it comes from.
data.author: Babyface

data.quote: Love cannot express the idea of music, while music may give an idea of love.
data.author: Hector Berlioz

data.quote: For me, the backdrop of half the experiences of life includes music.
data.author: Amy Grant

data.quote: Half the battle is selling music, not singing it. It's the image, not what you sing.
data.author: Rod Stewart

data.quote: But recently I began to feel that maybe I wouldn't be able to do what I want to do and need to do with American musicians, who are imprisoned behind these bars; music's got these bars and measures you know.
data.author: Sun Ra

data.quote: The music industry is saying, This is the format, and if you'll fit into this format, you can be on radio, and if radio will play you, MTV will expose you, and MTV will expose you, we'll sell records.
data.author: Nikki Sixx

data.quote: I hate most of what constitutes rock music, which is basically middle-aged crap.
data.author: Sting

data.quote: Most people wouldn't know music if it came up and bit them on the ass.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: What is this? It's music to get a brain seizure by.
data.author: Ozzy Osbourne

data.quote: There are certain things in which mediocrity is not to be endured, such as poetry, music, painting, public speaking.
data.author: Jean de la Bruyere

data.quote: Music, as many people have said, is the universal language. Of course points are made which make you think about things, but ultimately it makes you feel. And that's why people remember more songs that have meant something during their life than films. They start to define periods in your life, and that's kind of the beauty of it.
data.author: Scott Weiland

data.quote: My whole thing is not just to play music for people, but to make them part of the evening.
data.author: Marvin Hamlisch

data.quote: Before breaking into music, I had various jobs: forklift driver, driving a courier. But I was forced into working rather than doing it off my own bat because that was my dad's way: you got a job and paid your way.
data.author: Gary Numan

data.quote: I start really missing London when I go away. I have a little flat, but very central. I live above a pub and you'd think it'd be a nightmare, but I like hearing the music and it's quite comforting.
data.author: Ellie Goulding

data.quote: Now is now, and I live everything one day at a time. The fact that I'm still on the planet and able to still make music is such a miracle.
data.author: Ronnie Milsap

data.quote: If you invent something, you're doing a creative act. It's like writing a novel or composing music. You put your heart and soul into it, and money. It's years of your life, it's your house remortgaged, huge emotional investment and financial investment.
data.author: James Dyson

data.quote: I'm not necessarily that big of a clubbing junkie, but I really like dance music as a genre.
data.author: Mika

data.quote: I don't need an award to inspire me to keep making music.
data.author: Jake Bugg

data.quote: I find a therapy in playing music, in many different ways.
data.author: Dave Matthews

data.quote: We're all just animals. That's all we are, and everything else is just an elaborate justification of our instincts. That's where music comes from. And romantic poetry. And bad novels.
data.author: Elvis Costello

data.quote: The music industry is dominated by guys. I work with men 98 percent of the time - producers, arrangers, musicians, engineers.
data.author: Shakira

data.quote: Everyone one-on-one will be completely honest about the music that they listen to. But then you get into a group situation, and then it's the cool/uncool debate. I have really done my very best to reinforce the very fact that your heart knows better than your head does what you like when it comes to music and what not.
data.author: Corey Taylor

data.quote: I always tell the fans, 'Screw it! Like what you like. Listen to what you want.' Insisting that one type of music is better than the next is snobbery, and I have no time for that. Check out all the music that's out there. There's great stuff you're probably missing.
data.author: Corey Taylor

data.quote: In country music, one of the ways we may have gone wrong in the past is trying to be politically correct all the time.
data.author: Blake Shelton

data.quote: As humans, we have the tendency to call on God only when we think that we're in dire straits as opposed to cultivating a real relationship with Him every day. And that's what my music tries to convey to all the listeners - try to cultivate it every day.
data.author: Yolanda Adams
